item.title: SPA within a SPA? Durandal child routers
item.description: My current project had an interesting requirement come through: “We want the app to navigate to another single page app when the user clicks next on this page, but still have our widgets at the top”. The client wanted to utilise an existing durandal SPA inside a new durandal spa.
